cause.description:
To motivate and empower individuals to make a positive difference within our global society through understanding and action based on effective and compassionate leadership.
Mission: Hugh O’Brian Youth Leadership provides lifelong leadership development opportunities that empower individuals to achieve their highest potential.
1. Volunteerism
2. Excellence
3. Organizational Integrity
4. Diversity
5. Innovative Thinking
6. Community Partnership
7. Lifelong Learning Leadership Opportunities
cause.mission: Shape the minds of the future leaders of tomorrow
cause.name: HOBY
